page.title: 09BALLINDALLOCH ATTITUDES
page.content: People like living in this area because of its scenery,peace and quiet,gentle pace of life,friendly folk and the moderate climate(although many feel that the weather often has room for improvement!) They feel, however, that there are some disadvantages e.g. a poor bus service, no train service,no police station,the distance from large shops,the cost of travel to larger centres,the noise of low-flying aircraft from a nearby air-base etc. But most think that these disadvantages are outweighed by the advantages. Some consider that the area needs new industries to give further employment so that more young people would be able to live here.
